attributes.action: Recognize and honor the rights of married persons in this country NOT to be split apart because of unfair tests and financial restrictions
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We believe that marriage is sacrid and Holy unto God,and that NO man,power,or Government should have the right to split up a legally binding and loving marriage.Under the new immigrations laws,if a British citizen marries a non british citizen the immigrating person is given a 2 year Visa for limited leave to remain.After 2 years of marriage,they must then obtain another Visa for Unlimited to remain.In addition to this Visa they must now pass a test,or face deportation,and thus a break in the marriage.We believe this is UNJUST and unconstutional,and violates the rights of married persons,and the sanctity of marriage.We further do not believe it is right that a loving,legal marriage be torn apart due to ones ability to pass a test,and would emplore that this ruling be changed.Afterall,the wedding vows do state "Til DEATH (not government) do part"
